long_description: All-natural MiraZyme(TM) eliminates odor caused by mold, mildew and bacteria from clothing, footwear and gear. Bio-degradable solution of 10 microbial elements penetrates into the pores of fabric, rubber and even hard surfaces to eliminate odor naturally. Fast, effective and completely safe for the environment, leaving only carbon dioxide and water as by-products. Ideal for cleaning hundreds of items including PFDs, wetsuits, dry suits, tents, backpacks, bivy sacks, neoprene gloves and booties. Solution is mixed with water; works quickly and thoroughly with one application, no need for lengthy soaking.
short_description: All-natural MiraZyme(TM) eliminates odor caused by mold, mildew and bacteria from clothing, footwear and gear.
